forum.ask_a_question_on_forums: Ask a question on the forums
forum.return_to_home: Return to the knowledge base home
forum.ask_your_question_on_forum: Ask your question on the forums

hero.help_question: What can we help you with?
hero.check_forum: If you can't find where you're looking for, check out our forum

overview.no_categories_found: Sorry, no categories were found here...
overview.no_articles_found: No articles were found in this category

search.title: Search
search.searched_for: You have searched for {searchterm}, there were {results} results.
search.use_searchbox_below: Use the searchbox below to search in our knowledge base.

not_found.title: Item not found
not_found.description: Sorry, this article or category no longer exist on this place.
not_found.solution: You might use the search box above to find where you were looking for.

support_ratings.helful_support: Are you satisfied with how we handled your support ticket?
support_ratings.feedback: Thank you for your review, do you have any feedback?
support_ratings.feedback_not_helpful: Sorry this article was not helpful, what were you looking for?
support_ratings.finished: Thank you! Your feedback has been saved.

validation.invalid_discussion: Woops, something went wrong. You cannot rate this article/support ticket.
validation.guest: Please log in before you rate this article.
validation.neutral_emoji_disabled: The neutral emoji has been disabled.

article_ratings.title: Article ratings
article_ratings.no_ratings_found: No ratings found matching your search criteria
article_ratings.article_not_rated: This article has not been rated yet.
article_ratings.confirm_delete_rating: Are you sure you want to delete this rating?

redirect.title: Redirecting you to our Knowledge Base article...
redirect.link: Click here if the page does not redirect you

composer.warning_save_changes:
WARNING: You are about to leave this page and haven't saved your changes. Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

[OK] = Yes, save. [CANCEL] = No, don't save

tickets.subject: Subject
tickets.ticket_does_not_exist: The requested support ticket does not exist.

open.title: Open
open.description: This ticket has a new response and is waiting for your reply.

pending.title: Pending
pending.description: This ticket is waiting for reply from the user.
pending.description_user: We are waiting for you to reply or mark this ticket as solved.

closed.title: Closed
closed.is_closed: This ticket is closed, when you reply it will reopen. We recommend only to reopen a ticket when the issue hasn't been solved. If it is a new issue, please open a new ticket.
closed.is_auto_closed: This ticket is closed due to inactivity.

on_hold.title: On hold
on_hold.description: This ticket has been set on hold.

duplicate.title: Duplicate
duplicate.description: This ticket is marked as a duplicate.

solved.title: Solved
solved.description: This ticket is marked as solved

language.title: Language
language.description: Your support ticket will be handled in {language}.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Try to describe your question in one short sentence.

information.title: Ticket information
information.placeholder: Tell us what we can help you with

compose_ticket.title: Write a new ticket
compose_ticket.private_support: For private support, you can use this form to create a new ticket in our support platform. For non-private support matters, please see our public forums.
compose_ticket.not_allowed: You cannot open a new support ticket now

my_tickets.title: My tickets
my_tickets.description: On this page you will be able to find all your private tickets.

overview.title: Tickets overview
overview.description: Smile, you are the hero who saves other people their day.
overview.no_tickets: There are no tickets matching your criteria, probably you're doing a good job!

replied_to_ticket.subject: {replier_display_name} replied to your ticket #{ticket_id}
replied_to_ticket.body:
Dear {recipient_display_name},

{replier_display_name} replied to your ticket #{ticket_id} (subject '{subject}').

Please use the link below to review the reply:
{url}

We are waiting for your reply or until you mark this ticket as resolved.

ticket_status_update.subject: Ticket #{ticket_id} is marked as {new_status}
ticket_status_update.body:
Dear {recipient_display_name},

The status of your ticket #{ticket_id} has changed to {new_status}.

The URL of your ticket is:
{url}

ticket_resolved.subject: Ticket #{ticket_id} is marked as resolved
ticket_resolved.body:
Dear {recipient_display_name},

Your ticket #{ticket_id} has been marked as resolved. This means your ticket has been closed.

The URL of your ticket is:
{url}

If you disagree marking your ticket as resolved, please reply to your ticket to reopen it.

ticket_pending_reply.subject: Ticket #{ticket_id} is waiting for your reply
ticket_pending_reply.body:
Dear {recipient_display_name},

Recently {replier_display_name} replied to your ticket #{ticket_id} on {replied_date} and we are waiting for your reply.

The URL of your ticket is:
{url}

If the issue has been resolved, please mark the ticket as resolved.

ticket_pending_reply_closed.subject: Ticket #{ticket_id} has been closed due to inactivity
ticket_pending_reply_closed.body:
Dear {recipient_display_name},

Recently {replier_display_name} replied to your ticket #{ticket_id}. Unfortunately we did not get a reply from you. Your ticket has been automatically closed due to inactivity.

If you still wish to reply, the URL of your ticket is:
{url}
